data.title: The main celebration of 20 years of Slovenia in the EU
data.meta_description: Slovenia became a member of the European Union on 1 May 2004. The 20th anniversary of its accession will be celebrated on Europe Day, 9 May in Nova Gorica.
data.text:
Where Bevk Square and the Grand Hall of the Municipal Palace, Nova Gorica

Simulation of the European Parliament and Activity Market

Where Bevk Square, Nova Gorica

Discover successful projects implemented with the help of European funds

Where Xcenter in Krilo Rusjan, Nova Gorica

Discover programs from the application book of the European Capital of Culture (EPK)

Where Hotel Perla, Nova Gorica

A conversation with the Minister of Foreign and European Affairs with selected Slovenians in EU institutions

Where Lawn in front of the Municipal Palace, Nova Gorica

Concert by Vlado Kreslin and Mali bogovi

Where lobby of the Municipal Palace, Nova Gorica

Collection ART CIRCLE / International Festival of Visual Arts
